title: Inventory Forecasting Case Study
description: Developed machine learning models to optimize inventory levels and forecast sales trends across product categories. Conducted data analysis to identify key trends and improve model performance. Provided insights to enhance inventory management, boost profitability, and reduce overstock.

title: Soil Behavior Prediction for Infrastructure Design
description: Developed a soil behavior prediction model using web-scraped USGS data and Gaussian Process Regression. Created 3D visualizations to optimize drilling and construction while delivering reports to enhance research accuracy and infrastructure planning.

title: Wine Recommender
description:
Wine recommender system that uses both content-based predictions and collaborative filtering to provide personalized wine recommendations.
Project is still in development.

title: League of Legends Side and Picks Analysis
description: Analyzed 10,000+ League of Legends matches (2022-2024) to evaluate how starting side, champion picks, and early-game stats influence game outcomes. Key insights can help coaches refine strategies and maximize in-game advantages.

title: Bikeshare Analysis
description: Analyzed 4.4 million bike rides to study weather and daylight effects on Washington D.C.'s Capital Bikeshare users. Casual riders took longer rides in good weather, while members rode consistently. Suggested weather-based promotions for casual users and reliable commuting options for members.

title: AWS Cloud Practitioner Certification
description: Demonstrated expertise in AWS services, cloud architecture, and security best practices. Optimized cloud costs by leveraging AWS pricing models and budgeting tools to enhance efficiency and reduce expenses.

title: IBM Data Science Professional Certificate
description: Developed regression models to predict housing prices and trained machine learning models for loan defaults and rocket reusability. Built a dynamic Python dashboard to monitor US flight reliability using Plotly.

title: Image Processor & Classifier from Scratch
description: Developed an image processor and classifier from scratch using Python. Implemented image processing techniques such as grayscale, adding blur, and edge detection. Trained a KNN classifier to classify images based on day and night.
